segments.text: I see the open cabinet doors and the large cookie jar, so enticing to kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's determination to get those cookies is almost admirable, but reckless too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Part of me feels excited for them, but most of me is gripping my seat in fear.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what the woman would do if she caught them in the act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems blissfully unaware, lost in her mundane task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water continues to spill, and I feel a pit in my stomach; something has to give soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their little secret feels so mischievous and wrong, yet it also brings a smile to my face.
segments.speaker: PAR
